markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Masquerade of Seasons Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4044) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Bard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=19" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=139" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 126</row>

</column>

---

You have mastered the opening steps to the Masquerade of Seasons, a dance that channels the power of spring, summer, winter, and autumn. Choose one of the following traits: [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118), or [cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27). You gain resistance 5 to damage dealt by effects with the chosen trait. You can use an action to reenter this stance at any time, changing the granted resistance to another of the available options. If you are at least 12th level, the granted resistance increases to be equal to half your level.

<title level="2">Masquerade of Seasons Stance leads to...</title>
[Grand Dance](/Feats.aspx?ID=4046), [Pirouette](/Feats.aspx?ID=4045)
name: Masquerade of Seasons Stance
